DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of BOTOX® treatment in Korean adults with chronic migraine.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of BOTOX® in Korean Adults With Chronic Migraine
DOC.criteria: Ethnically Korean with a diagnosis of chronic migraine Anticipated need for botulinum toxin treatment for any reason other than chronic migraine during the study Diagnosis of myasthenia gravis, EatonLambert syndrome, or amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
